name: procedural chaos generation
description:
Have you ever wanted to play Baba is You, except all the rules and levels are randomized at run time and all the art is by different artists?

No? You are Incorrect.

Made in 48 hours for (the) Games Den Quick game jam!

Credits

Art by:

Jamie Powers - Minnie Fumo

Samuel Anderson - Horny Nitori

Ronan Sandoval - uwu cat boy

Omer Ahmed - slerp

Zoe Snyder - Critter Ball

Gabrielle Tian - Hando, Abby, Word Art

Yalmaz Abdullah - Tim

Vivian Liang - "the uwu"

Stephanie Prudek - motherfucker

The rest by Emily Halina (code, music, graphic design)
